libraryName.doc: The name of the library that is associated with Overdrive

username.doc: The username used to login to the Overdrive library website

password.doc: The password used to login to the Overdrive library website

directoryPattern.doc: The pattern used to name the directories that will contain the audiobook files

filePattern.doc: The pattern used to name the audiobook files

titlePattern.doc: The pattern used to format the title tag during ID3 tag normalization

loglevel.doc: The log level used to specify the logging granularity
